gampola rathmalkaduwa bodhirukkharamaye di senapura sumana himiyange ha gampolawaththe dhammapala himiyange anushasana paridi shri bodhi lama ha praja sanwardhana padanama ha shri bodhi tharuna bauddha samithiya mangin sanwidhanaya karana dharma deshana malawa wesak masa 17 wana dina sita 23 wana dina dakwa pawathwe. 17 wana da kawyamaya dharmadeshanaya makulemada chandima himi, 18 wana da wishesha bodhi pujawa niyanwela shasanarathana himi, 19 wana da dharma deshanaya dimbaul kumbaure wisuddhananda himi, 20 wana da dharma deshanaya welangahawaththe sagara himi, 21 wana da dharma deshanaya handungamuwe panynyasara himi, 22 wana da wishesha dharma deshanaya mahanuwara lewalle senasuna bhawana madhyasthanadhipathi rajakiya panditha missaka kamalasiri nahimi, 23 wana da dharma deshanaya sandiligama aananda himi, 24 wana dina dawasa pura pinkam malawak da edina paswaru 6.00 ta kapruk pujawa, chathumadhura pujawa, bodhi pujawa, rathri 7.30 ta bath dansala ha rathri 8.00 ta thorana wiwrutha we. 25 wana dina sawasa 6.00 ta bodhi pujawa aarambha we.

shri lanka nidahas pakshaye bandaranayaka salakuna thiranathmaka lesa abhiyogayata lakwanne 1994 - 2004 dasa wasara kalaya bandaranayaka chinthanaya dosar karamin ee matha libaral prajathanthrawadiya ropanaya wanne sathya washayenma shri lanka nidahas pakshaya thula siduwiya yuthu kalina prathisanskarana parasayan ikmawa yamini. 1977- 1994 e.ja.pa. rajaya gena giya wiwrutha aarthika prathipaththiya sema uchchasthanayata wardhanaya wi thibu el. ti. ti. ee. sahasikathwaya thula bahuwidha antharjathika pelambaawimwalata nathu wi siti chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga mahathmiya 1993 shri lanka nidahas paksha gamaka balaya wimata pera eksath samajawadi peramune nayikawa lesa yuropa modalaye pulul samaja prathisanskarana kriyawaliyakata athagasa thibuni.
